original_text: And his house where he dwelt had another court within the porch, which was of the like work. Solomon made also an house for Pharaoh's daughter, whom he had taken to wife, like unto this porch.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 거처할 왕궁은 그 주랑 뒤 다른 뜰에 있으니 그 양식이 동일하며 솔로몬이 또 그가 장가 든 바로의 딸을 위하여 집을 지었는데 이 주랑과 같더라

sentences.original_text: And his house where he dwelt
had another court within the porch
sentences.korean_translation: 현관 안에 또 다른 뜰이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: which was of the like work
whom he had taken to wife
